description:
As guest director Mike says as we start our scene, we're doing things a little 'backwards.' But not really.

Here, let's explain: Mike had shot a solo with Wayne before, but he can't find it. Yes, really. Evidently, Mike's stash of porn is so vast and great, he simply is misplacing all that hot porn he's shooting. (Truly, this sounds like it's a perfect War Chest Update, since I had originally intended for the War Chest Updates to showcase found footage and stuff that I had kind of 'lost' to the wilds.)

So, we finally get a proper introduction to Wayne -- who you have already met before in some hard core scenes that he's done.

Wayne stands at a tall 6'2' and weighs a strapping 182 lbs. Mike jokes with him at one point in the video, saying 'Wonder what else I can talk you into doing?' All Wayne does is chuckle in response.

Mike presses on, 'Not gonna tell, are ya?'

'Nope,' Wayne shoots back, smiling.

Well, we know what Wayne has gotten up to . . . and it was quite a bit!

So make sure to check out Wayne's solo, and browse his other scenes too!
title: Wayne - Solo
